mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressmen Arch Moore and Frank Horton
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressmen Arch A. Moore, Jr. and Frank Horton (N.Y.) sitting at a desk talking. The photograph is signed, "To an outstanding and talented legislator and one I am proud to work with in the Congress. With warm regards, Frank Horton".

Horton, Frank J (Frank Jefferson), 19192004

LegislatorsUnited States
